abstract: Major League Baseball's all-time hit king Pete Rose is participating in on-field, pregame event before All-Star Game, rare moment of inclusion since his expulsion from MLB 25 years ago for betting on games.
lead_paragraph: Rose, ineligible for the Hall of Fame, visited Normal, Ill., this week for a minor league promotion and will participate in an on-field event before Tuesday’s All-Star Game.

headline.main: Pete Rose at the Corn Crib: Next Stop, the All-Star Game
headline.print_headline: Taking Any Honor He Can Get

snippet: Rose, ineligible for the Hall of Fame, visited Normal, Ill., this week for a minor league promotion and will participate in an on-field event before Tuesday’s All-Star Game.
